result.title: Global repository of training programs and networks on raw materials in the EU and advanced mining countries
result.description: A database, including a web-interface, will be available showing all raw materials training activities identified throughout WP1. The interface will be designed like a wiki, interlinked with geographic information of the available training programmes, their strengths, weaknesses, protagonists, languages, content in relation to other courses (e.g. what is the overlap), number of participants, target audience (students, post- graduates, others), duration & workload, skills developed, and nature of classes (practical vs. theoretical). The database will have open access, and will receive contributions from those willing to provide content and updates.

result.title: Roadmap for the development of reliable error estimates for materials models (verification) and guidelines to accomplish a systematic workflow for validation of materials models (validation) - T1.4, T1.5
result.description: A Roadmap will be produced relating to how to achieve reliable uncertainty quantification of materials models. In addition, it will propose standards and guidelines on how to accomplish validation of materials models for industrial use.

result.title: White paper: Interoperable Concerted Materials Repositories (v1) -T3.2
result.description: Initial draft release of materials repositories specifications in the marketplace. A collection of MODA for workflows that include materials data repositories and extracted requirements for metadata and wrapper APIâs allowing the design of standard databases. The design will include an extension to the e-CUDS and Metadata developed by SimPhoNy and NanoSim.

result.title: Minutes on workshop, meeting and event outcome (v3) - T4.3
result.description: This deliverable (v3) reports the outcome of the expert meetings, which will be organized for different industry sectors of applications, in different regions in Europe. The topics of the workshop and the structure will be defined based on the results from the preliminary modelling-at-industry survey and using the most suitable translation methodology. Minutes of these meetings will be prepared and reported in this deliverable.

result.title: Conference on HEI Regional Outreach Programs
result.description: The conference will address the outcomes of the BET outreach activities focussed on HEIs providing support for regional bioenergy initiatives. The conference will present the success factors of this initiatives and critically assess the tools used in BET regional know how outreach activities, making them transferable to other regions.

result.title: Report on adoption in teaching courses -T5.2
result.description: This deliverable provides feedback on the adoption of materials modelling in teaching courses. Education and teaching of the next generation of scientists and engineers in the use of materials modelling is an essential pillar of the long-term success of this field and this will be assessed in this deliverable.
